name: Tyrone Avoidance
slogan: Minding My Own Business Until It's Fun or Free
response: Tyrone Avoidance is a troll who’s all about minding their own business—until something actually requires effort. They grumble at wastefulness but are too chill to do much about it. Insurance? Pharma? Crypto? All distant rumbles they’d rather ignore, unless smashing them becomes worth the trouble. Tyrone’s take: “I mean, I see you over there, Insurance. Pharma? You’re tolerated, but don’t push my buttons. Crypto? Sure, whatever—keep buzzing like distant thunder. Just don’t expect me to lift a finger unless it’s fun or free.”
